title: Poshtkuh, Rafsanjan
text: Poshtkuh (, also <a href="Romanize">Romanize</a>d as Poshtkūh; also known as Posht Kūh’īyeh) is a village in <a href="Raviz%20Rural%20District">Raviz Rural District</a>, <a href="Koshkuiyeh%20District">Koshkuiyeh District</a>, <a href="Rafsanjan%20County">Rafsanjan County</a>, <a href="Kerman%20Province">Kerman Province</a>, <a href="Iran">Iran</a>. At the 2006 census, its population was 8, in 4 families.
